articles.author: Diego Colman
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: Dreams of Fresh Record Shattered for Now as Bears Pounce - DailyFX
articles.description: The outlook for gold is starting to become more bearish from a fundamental standpoint, as the resilience of the U.S. economy could induce the Federal Reserve to continue raising rates later this year.
articles.content:
• Gold prices fail to mount recovery as bond yields resume their rebound
  • Strong U.S. economic data may nudge the Fed to continue hiking rates during the second half of the year, even if… [+3646 chars]

articles.title: US telecom stocks hit as Amazon in talks for cellphone services - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The online retail giant’s entry could cause major disruptions in US telecom which has some of highest charges globally.
articles.content: Shares of Verizon Communications Inc, AT&T Inc and T-Mobile US Inc declined on Friday after a report said Amazon.com was in talks with the US telecom firms to offer low-cost wireless services to … [+2441 chars]
